Hi Edward, 

Sure thing, confirming the suburbs have been linked. 

The additional SEO improvements depend on many factors but without speaking at depth, I would recommend uploading the blogs to your Google Business Profile. Your profile is a key element of local SEO. Google has confirmed that regular updates are a ranking factor and, given you are writing blogs, is an easy and efficient way of helping your business stand out in Google search. 

If you'd like a hand with the uploads, please let me know and we can use your support hours.
